metadata.title: Studies show AI is ALREADY making us dumber - Microsoft, Carnegie Melon, and SBS
metadata.description:
#openaio3 #deepseek #generativeai #llm #futureofai #softwareengineering #samaltman #microsoft #carnegiemellon 

Studies:
https://www.mdpi.com/2075-4698/15/1/6
https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/research/uploads/prod/2025/01/lee_2025_ai_critical_thinking_survey.pdf?ref=404media.co

Generative AI tools like ChatGPT, Copilot, and others are transforming how we work‚Äîbut at what cost? A recent study explores how these tools impact critical thinking, revealing surprising shifts in how knowledge workers approach tasks. The study found that when people trust AI too much, they often skip the reflective, problem-solving steps that define critical thinking. Meanwhile, others find themselves shifting from task execution to oversight, focusing more on verifying AI-generated content than producing it themselves.

In this video, we'll discuss these findings, why they matter, and what it means for the future of human thought in the workplace. Is AI helping us think smarter‚Äîor just making us think less? Tune in to find out.

---------
 üë©‚Äçüíª Learn to Code here: https://scrimba.com/?via=codycodes  (I've found a lot of great value)

I've been a software engineer since 2008 and with over a decade of experience, the industry is as crazy and as varied as ever.

I continually get asked for career advice and how to navigate writing code for a living and I wanted to share everything I've learned in hopes that I can help someone who is just starting in software engineering, who has been in it for a while and is too afraid to ask, or the seasoned vet to either agree or argue with me.

The intent of this channel is to have multiple series that include the following topics:
üí∞ Compensation
üìà Negotiations
üìö Career advice and guidance
üìà Stocks, RSUs, Stock options, and ESPP plans
üë®‚Äçüè´  Engineering interviews

I've done just about everything in software from working for 3 person start ups, 300 person start ups, silicon valley companies, Fortune 500 companies, small teams, big teams, W2 employment and 1099 contracting, full time contracting and moonlight part time work, independent development, launching my own web apps and iphone app.

core_summary.core_concepts: The video discusses studies on how generative AI tools impact critical thinking among knowledge workers, emphasizing the balance between reliance on AI and maintaining problem-solving skills.
key_insights: Excessive trust in AI leads to a decline in critical thinking processes.
Workers are shifting from active task execution to oversight of AI-generated content.

news_details.context: The video highlights research studies examining the effects of AI on human cognitive abilities in the workplace.
key_points: Generative AI tools are transforming work processes.
There is a risk that AI may make people think less critically.
